# tf.logging.log_if

``` python
tf.logging.log_if(
    level,
    msg,
    condition,
    *args
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/platform/tf_logging.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.10/tensorflow/python/platform/tf_logging.py).

Log 'msg % args' at level 'level' only if condition is fulfilled.
